issue.title: [CF 1626] Spellschool lockout event to disable border notification possible?
issue.body:
I came to wonder. Shouldnt there be a display option for when you track spells, to NOT have persay lava burst activation border glowing to show ready, when youve just been spellcschool lockedouted even if the spell otherwise is available?


> Posted by CurseForge user IcewolfDK | Imported from CurseForge issue #1626 | Raw

comments.body:
Not sure I understand.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Ok, let me try again.

 

Lets say I have an icon for flamestrike.    You have options to dim it for when out of range or not ready.

 

What I am missing is an option to dim it when spell lockouted from like a counterspell, silence or kick.   As well an option to -prevent- notification border to happen, if set to show when spellcooldown is ready IF you also currently suffer from spell lockout from an enemy.

 

Alternatively have the spell lockout condition moved in under spell not ready.

Theres no reason to have it display the spell as 'ready' when currently unavailable due to spell school lockout.

Edited Dec 17, 2018

> Posted by CurseForge user IcewolfDK

There's no API in the game to determine if you're spell locked, or if a cooldown on a spell is being caused by a spell lockout (vs just normally being on cooldown). A spell lockout is identical to a cooldown.

Edited Dec 24, 2018

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
